text: @GOP @realDonaldTrump #ChumpTrump focuses on the WRONG things. Picks battles with NASCAR, NFL; thinks those are our most imminent threats. Our THREATS are lack of leadership (#Trump_Pence), UNCONTROLLED #COVID19; rise of BANKRUPTCIES; U.S. on DO NOT TRAVEL list, & #DividerInChief. #Republicans4Change
